00030 template<class K, class D> class ckMap
00031 {
00032 public:
00034     ckDefineException(ExceptionInvalidArgument);
00035     ckDefineException(ExceptionNotFound);
00036     ckDefineException(ExceptionNotInitialized);
00037     ckDefineException(ExceptionSameKeyExists);
00039 
00043     ckMap()
00044     {
00045         m_hash_list = NULL;
00046         m_last_item1 = m_last_item2 = m_last_item3 = NULL;
00047         m_hash_size = 0;
00048         m_data_num = 0;
00049     }
00050 
00054     ~ckMap()
00055     {
00056         clear();
00057 
00058         if (m_hash_list)
00059         {
00060             ckDeleteArray(m_hash_list, ckList<MapItem>);
00061         }
00062     }
00063 
00069     void init(u16 hash_size)
00070     {
00071         if (hash_size == 0)
00072         {
00073             ckThrow(ExceptionInvalidArgument);
00074         }
00075 
00076         clear();
00077 
00078         if (m_hash_list)
00079         {
00080             ckDeleteArray(m_hash_list, ckList<MapItem>);
00081         }
00082 
00083         m_hash_size = hash_size;
00084         ckNewArray(m_hash_list, ckList<MapItem>, m_hash_size);
00085     }
00086 
00091     u16 getHashSize() const
00092     {
00093         return m_hash_size;
00094     }
00095 
00100     u16 getDataNum() const
00101     {
00102         return m_data_num;
00103     }
00104 
00110     D* get(K key)
00111     {
00112         D* data = getN(key);
00113 
00114         if (!data)
00115         {
00116             ckThrow(ExceptionNotFound);
00117         }
00118 
00119         return data;
00120     }
00121 
00128     D* getN(K key)
00129     {
00130         if (!m_hash_list)
00131         {
00132             ckThrow(ExceptionNotInitialized);
00133         }
00134 
00135         if (m_last_item1 && m_last_item1->key == key)
00136         {
00137             return &m_last_item1->data;
00138         }
00139         else if (m_last_item2 && m_last_item2->key == key)
00140         {
00141             MapItem* item = m_last_item1;
00142             m_last_item1 = m_last_item2;
00143             m_last_item2 = item;
00144 
00145             return &m_last_item1->data;
00146         }
00147         else if (m_last_item3 && m_last_item3->key == key)
00148         {
00149             MapItem* item = m_last_item1;
00150             m_last_item1 = m_last_item3;
00151             m_last_item3 = m_last_item2;
00152             m_last_item2 = item;
00153 
00154             return &m_last_item1->data;
00155         }
00156         else
00157         {
00158             s32 index = key % m_hash_size;
00159             ckList<MapItem>* hash_list = &m_hash_list[(index < 0) ? -index : index];
00160 
00161             for (typename ckList<MapItem>::Item* item = hash_list->getFirstN(); item; item = item->getNextN())
00162             {
00163                 if (item->getSelf()->key == key)
00164                 {
00165                     m_last_item3 = m_last_item2;
00166                     m_last_item2 = m_last_item1;
00167                     m_last_item1 = item->getSelf();
00168 
00169                     hash_list->addFirst(item);
00170 
00171                     return &m_last_item1->data;
00172                 }
00173             }
00174 
00175             return NULL;
00176         }
00177     }
00178 
00184     void add(K key, const D& data)
00185     {
00186         if (!m_hash_list)
00187         {
00188             ckThrow(ExceptionNotInitialized);
00189         }
00190 
00191         if (getN(key))
00192         {
00193             ckThrow(ExceptionSameKeyExists);
00194         }
00195 
00196         MapItem* new_item = ckNew(MapItem);
00197 
00198         new_item->order_item.init(new_item);
00199         new_item->hash_item.init(new_item);
00200         new_item->key = key;
00201         new_item->data = data;
00202 
00203         m_order_list.addLast(&new_item->order_item);
00204 
00205         s32 index = key % m_hash_size;
00206         m_hash_list[(index < 0) ? -index : index].addLast(&new_item->hash_item);
00207 
00208         m_data_num++;
00209     }
00210 
00215     void remove(K key)
00216     {
00217         if (!m_hash_list)
00218         {
00219             ckThrow(ExceptionNotInitialized);
00220         }
00221 
00222         if (m_last_item1 && m_last_item1->key == key)
00223         {
00224             ckDelete(m_last_item1, MapItem);
00225             m_data_num--;
00226 
00227             m_last_item1 = m_last_item2;
00228             m_last_item2 = m_last_item3;
00229             m_last_item3 = NULL;
00230         }
00231         else if (m_last_item2 && m_last_item2->key == key)
00232         {
00233             ckDelete(m_last_item2, MapItem);
00234             m_data_num--;
00235 
00236             m_last_item2 = m_last_item3;
00237             m_last_item3 = NULL;
00238         }
00239         else if (m_last_item3 && m_last_item3->key == key)
00240         {
00241             ckDelete(m_last_item3, MapItem);
00242             m_data_num--;
00243 
00244             m_last_item3 = NULL;
00245         }
00246         else
00247         {
00248             s32 index = key % m_hash_size;
00249             ckList<MapItem>* hash_list = &m_hash_list[(index < 0) ? -index : index];
00250 
00251             for (typename ckList<MapItem>::Item* item = hash_list->getFirstN(); item; item = item->getNextN())
00252             {
00253                 if (item->getSelf()->key == key)
00254                 {
00255                     ckDelete(item->getSelf(), MapItem);
00256                     m_data_num--;
00257 
00258                     return;
00259                 }
00260             }
00261 
00262             ckThrow(ExceptionNotFound);
00263         }
00264     }
00265 
00269     void clear()
00270     {
00271         m_order_list.clear();
00272 
00273         if (m_hash_list)
00274         {
00275             for (s32 i = 0; i < m_hash_size; i++)
00276             {
00277                 ckList<MapItem>* hash_list = &m_hash_list[i];
00278 
00279                 while (hash_list->hasItem())
00280                 {
00281                     ckDelete(hash_list->getFirstN()->getSelf(), MapItem);
00282                 }
00283             }
00284 
00285             m_last_item1 = m_last_item2 = m_last_item3 = NULL;
00286             m_data_num = 0;
00287         }
00288     }
00289 
00294     const K* getFirstKeyN() const
00295     {
00296         if (!m_hash_list)
00297         {
00298             ckThrow(ExceptionNotInitialized);
00299         }
00300 
00301         return m_order_list.hasItem() ? &m_order_list.getFirstN()->getSelf()->key : NULL;
00302     }
00303 
00308     const K* getLastKeyN() const
00309     {
00310         if (!m_hash_list)
00311         {
00312             ckThrow(ExceptionNotInitialized);
00313         }
00314 
00315         return m_order_list.hasItem() ? &m_order_list.getLastN()->getSelf()->key : NULL;
00316     }
00317 
00324     const K* getPrevKeyN(K key)
00325     {
00326         ckTry
00327         {
00328             typename ckList<MapItem>::Item* prev = reinterpret_cast<MapItem*>(get(key))->order_item.getPrevN();
00329 
00330             return prev ? &prev->getSelf()->key : NULL;
00331         }
00332         ckCatch(ExceptionNotFound)
00333         {
00334             ckThrow(ExceptionInvalidArgument);
00335         }
00336 
00337         return NULL;
00338     }
00339 
00346     const K* getNextKeyN(K key)
00347     {
00348         ckTry
00349         {
00350             typename ckList<MapItem>::Item* next = reinterpret_cast<MapItem*>(get(key))->order_item.getNextN();
00351 
00352             return next ? &next->getSelf()->key : NULL;
00353         }
00354         ckCatch(ExceptionNotFound)
00355         {
00356             ckThrow(ExceptionInvalidArgument);
00357         }
00358 
00359         return NULL;
00360     }
00361 
00366     void moveFirst(K key)
00367     {
00368         ckTry
00369         {
00370             typename ckList<MapItem>::Item* item = &reinterpret_cast<MapItem*>(get(key))->order_item;
00371 
00372             m_order_list.addFirst(item);
00373         }
00374         ckCatch(ExceptionNotFound)
00375         {
00376             ckThrow(ExceptionInvalidArgument);
00377         }
00378     }
00379 
00384     void moveLast(K key)
00385     {
00386         ckTry
00387         {
00388             typename ckList<MapItem>::Item* item = &reinterpret_cast<MapItem*>(get(key))->order_item;
00389 
00390             m_order_list.addLast(item);
00391         }
00392         ckCatch(ExceptionNotFound)
00393         {
00394             ckThrow(ExceptionInvalidArgument);
00395         }
00396     }
00397 
00403     void moveBefore(K key, K next_key)
00404     {
00405         ckTry
00406         {
00407             typename ckList<MapItem>::Item* item = &reinterpret_cast<MapItem*>(get(key))->order_item;
00408             typename ckList<MapItem>::Item* next = &reinterpret_cast<MapItem*>(get(next_key))->order_item;
00409 
00410             item->joinBefore(next);
00411         }
00412         ckCatch(ExceptionNotFound)
00413         {
00414             ckThrow(ExceptionInvalidArgument);
00415         }
00416     }
00417 
00423     void moveAfter(K key, K prev_key)
00424     {
00425         ckTry
00426         {
00427             typename ckList<MapItem>::Item* item = &reinterpret_cast<MapItem*>(get(key))->order_item;
00428             typename ckList<MapItem>::Item* prev = &reinterpret_cast<MapItem*>(get(prev_key))->order_item;
00429 
00430             item->joinAfter(prev);
00431         }
00432         ckCatch(ExceptionNotFound)
00433         {
00434             ckThrow(ExceptionInvalidArgument);
00435         }
00436     }
00437 
00438 private:
00439     struct MapItem
00440     {
00441         D data; // This data member must be at the top of this structure.
00442         typename ckList<MapItem>::Item order_item;
00443         typename ckList<MapItem>::Item hash_item;
00444         K key;
00445     };
00446 
00447     ckMap(const ckMap<K, D>&) {}
00448     void operator=(const ckMap<K, D>&) {}
00449 
00450     ckList<MapItem> m_order_list;
00451     ckList<MapItem>* m_hash_list;
00452     MapItem* m_last_item1;
00453     MapItem* m_last_item2;
00454     MapItem* m_last_item3;
00455     u16 m_hash_size;
00456     u16 m_data_num;
00457 };
